SEARCH

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Character
Student
public class Student extends Character
The Student class is a subclass of the Character class, it represents a character that can not only attack but can also hide from an attack, where it takes zero damage when hidden. It has inherited all the instance variables and methods found in the Character superclass, but it has it's own new method that is used to hide, as well as overriding the hurt method to take zero damage while being hidden. It also has it's own new instance variable IsHidden which indicates whether the student is hiding.
Since:
2024-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Palden Tamang

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name, int energyLevel, int skillLevel)
      This constructor is used to construct a new Student with the given name, energyLevel and skillLevel.
      Parameters:
      name - This is the name of the student.
      energyLevel - This is the energy level of the student.
      skillLevel - This is the skill level of the student.

  • Method Details

    • hide

      public void hide()
      This method is used by the student character to hide. The value of IsHidden is set to true, indicating that the student is hidden now.

    • hurt

      public int hurt(int attackAmount)
      This overriden method applies to the student character, where it first checks if the student is hidden, which is if the value of IsHidden is currently true. If the student is currently hidden, the value of IsHidden is reset back to false so that the student is no longer hidden in the next round, and the integer value of zero is returned to indicate that the student has taken zero damage because it was hidden. If the student is not currently hidde, it takes damage as normal and energy level is reduced as normal by subtracting the attack damage dealt by the other character.
      Overrides:
      hurt in class Character
      Parameters:
      attackAmount - This is the amount of attack damage dealt by the other character.
      Returns:
      int returns the amount of damage/ hurt taken by the student.
